description: Harry Anderson's goal is enough to secure a win for Colchester at Cheltenham and keep their League Two play-off hopes alive.
title: Cheltenham Town 0-1 Colchester United
title_page: Cheltenham Town 0-1 Colchester United - BBC Sport
maintext:
Cheltenham Town are unbeaten across their last five league games against Colchester United (W3 D2), winning the reverse fixture 2-1 in October last year.
Colchester United have failed to win either of their last two away Football League games against Cheltenham Town and could go three without victory for the first time.
Cheltenham have lost just one of their last 12 home league games (W6 D5), scoring at least once in each of their last 14 at home.
Colchester are unbeaten across their last six away league games (W3 D3), and will be looking to go seven on the road without loss since January 2020 (8).
